data.eml:eml: A contribution to the Mutillidae (Hymenoptera) of Hong Kong

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barthélémy, Christophe, Lelej, Arkady S., Loktionov, Valery M. (2018): A contribution to the Mutillidae (Hymenoptera) of Hong Kong. Zootaxa 4514 (2): 230-242, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.2.6
